Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: "You're back at the lounge, having finished the day's tasks. You notice something out of the ordinary as soon as you turn on the light."}
{3: "There is a sticker of a birthday cake on the door and a party popper that's yet to be popped on the handle."}
{3: "And the journal that Bambinata gave you that you'd been keeping on your table is now nowhere to be seen."}
{3: 'Looking around your table, you come across a loose page from the journal underneath, with familiar handwriting.'}
{2: "Bambinata's handwriting", 3: '"I am your journal."'}
{2: "Bambinata's handwriting", 3: '"The journal has run away. You\'ll need certain clues to find me."'}
{3: 'Shaking the paper in confusion, you suddenly hear a muffled sound from the corner of the lounge.'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'In... the drawer.'}
{3: "Following the instruction, I see a cardboard box that's shaking slightly, overturned among a pile of unpacked packages."}
{2: 'Bambinata?'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Bambinata isn't here. You didn't hear Bambinata speak just now."}
{2: 'Alright. Here begins the "little thief" hunt, then.', 3: '15'}
{3: 'Holding back a laugh, you open the drawer as Bambinata suggested. Sure enough, there is another piece of paper with your own handwriting from a past entry.'}
{2: 'Your Handwriting', 3: '"I\'m taking Bambinata in for the routine check-up at the Star of Life today... Let\'s hope it isn\'t as painful as it was last time."'}
{3: 'Turning the page over, you see a hastily drawn Star of Life symbol and a message from Bambinata.'}
{2: "Bambinata's handwriting", 3: '"The journal says it won\'t hurt anymore if the commandant is here."'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Cough...'}
{3: 'The "box" moves again, and the person inside gives an overly deliberate hint.'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "The journal has run away again. This time... it's probably hiding in the fridge."}
{2: 'In the fridge, huh...', 3: '23'}
{3: 'The moment you open the fridge, a bunch of sky-blue balloons come pouring out, with another piece of paper with your handwriting on it attached to the string.'}
{2: 'Your Handwriting', 3: '"Saw a robot handing out free balloons at Memorial Park today when I passed by. I took one and gave it to Bambinata. Vanessa rolled her eyes but didn\'t say anything."'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Bambinata... doesn't remember the balloon, but Master said if you like a gift from someone, you should thank them sincerely."}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Bambinata likes it very much...'}
{3: 'The voice coming from under the box thanked you, the speaker seemingly having forgotten that she was supposed to be "hiding."'}
{2: 'So... where am I supposed to look next?', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Not gonna tell you! Bambinata... really isn't here."}
{3: 'A few seconds later, another hint comes from inside the box.'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Hmm... check the backside.'}
{3: "But you've done that alreadyâ€”and seen only a few blue balloons, with a figure holding them under the balloons."}
{2: "Bambinata's handwriting", 3: '"Thank you."'}
{3: 'A few dots come after the "thank you." Bambinata probably grew a little hesitant writing this line, but went on to add one more line.'}
{2: "Bambinata's handwriting", 3: '"The journal says, \'Thank you.\'"'}
{2: "Bambinata's handwriting", 3: "The journal has run away again, and it's in the box this time."}
{3: 'Feeling affirmed, you immediately walk up to the box in the corner holding the loose journal pages Bambinata left you with.'}
{3: "The box starts shaking violently. When you're just a few steps away from it, it opens a crack, revealing Bambinata's face."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'S-surprise! Happy Birthday!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Ah! It's Bambinata!", 3: '42', 4: 'I knew it!', 5: '42'}

{3: "Removing the box, you see Bambinata holding a few colorful balloons. On top of that, there are small boxes in all shapes, candles, dolls... She probably came bringing everything that's got to do with birthday."}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Ah! Commandant... Happy Birthday... Bambinata puts your birthday down... on the first page of the journey when Master told Bambinata about your birthday.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'So... do you like all of these?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course. Thank you for going out of your way to do all of these for me, Bambinata.', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Today is a very important day because it marks the beginning of you, Commandant, which is why Bambinata needs to take it seriously, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'These balloons are for you, and this here, too... and here is your journal Commandant. Here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Bambinata wants to see... more entries about Bambinata in the future!', 4: '1'}
